segments.text: I glance into the kitchen and freeze.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing with water cascading down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is utterly unaware, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pooling around her feet on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy's balancing on a stool that's tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar up in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, arm extended, expecting a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a serene garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such hidden chaos in this ordinary setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks seconds from collapsing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How has the woman not heard the water or seen the kids?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is wild; it's like time is frozen before the storm.
segments.speaker: PAR
